Biological work-up (hypoglycaemia, ionic disorders: dyskalaemia, hypercalcaemia, hypocalcaemia, hyponatraemia, anaemia) blood gas, PR (pulmonary embolism)

ECG: rhythm disorders

Injection-free brain scan: (subdural haematoma, extra-dural haematoma, stroke)

question.question: What are the main complementary examinations other than imaging in the presence of a walking or balance disorder?
question.option_a: Blood tests for infections (e.g. Lyme disease, meningitis)
question.option_b: Biological work-up (hypoglycaemia, ionic disorders: dyskalaemia, hypercalcaemia, hypocalcaemia, hyponatraemia, anaemia), blood gas, PR (pulmonary embolism), ECG: rhythm disorders
question.option_c: Sleep studies to rule out sleep apnea
question.option_d: Genetic testing for inherited conditions (e.g. Friedreich's ataxia)
